name: Action Boat Racing 3D
description:
Race your superboat in the ultimate challenge and wave racer. Action Boat Racing 3D is on its way to becoming the #1 critically-acclaimed and most popular 3D motorboat racing game.
The app combines excellent visuals and sound with stunning gameplay and head on water traffic. This powerboat racer offers an exhilarating mix of intense fun with challenging coin collection. As you raced through tight canal at breakneck speeds you’ll find yourself struggle to retain control and reach the maximum distance possible. Collect as many coins as possible to get the needed upgrades.
Features:
- 5 Boats to choose from
- Earn coins to buy and upgrade vehicles
- Stunning 3D graphics and smooth with realistic boat handling
How to Play:
- Touch bottom right gas button to accelerate
- Touch bottom left brake button to slow down
- Tilt to steer the powerboat
